deleteMessages.description: This action will clear all message history. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteMessages.title: Очистити всі повідомлення

import.description: The current LoRa configuration will be overridden.
import.presetDescription: The current LoRa Config will be replaced.
import.title: Import Channel Set

pkiRegenerateDialog.title: Regenerate Pre-Shared Key?
pkiRegenerateDialog.description: Are you sure you want to regenerate the pre-shared key?

addConnection.title: Add connection
addConnection.description: Choose a connection type and fill in the details

validation.requiresWebBluetooth: This connection type requires <0>Web Bluetooth</0>. Please use a supported browser, like Chrome or Edge.
validation.requiresWebSerial: This connection type requires <0>Web Serial</0>. Please use a supported browser, like Chrome or Edge.
validation.requiresSecureContext: This application requires a <0>secure context</0>. Please connect using HTTPS or localhost.
validation.additionallyRequiresSecureContext: Additionally, it requires a <0>secure context</0>. Please connect using HTTPS or localhost.

notSupported.title: Web Bluetooth not supported
notSupported.description: Your browser or device does not support Web Bluetooth

bluetoothConnection.helperText: Uses the Meshtastic Bluetooth service for discovery.

serialConnection.helperText: Selecting a port grants permission so the app can open it to connect.

notSupported.title: Web Serial not supported
notSupported.description: Your browser or device does not support Web Serial

invalidUrl.title: Некоректна адреса URL
invalidUrl.description: Please enter a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.

connectionTest.description: Test the connetion before saving to verify the device is reachable.

success.title: Тест з'єднання успішний
success.description: The device appears to be reachable.

failure.title: Connection test failed
failure.description: Could not reach the device. Check the URL and try again.

nodeDetails.title: Node Details for {{identifier}}
nodeDetails.KeyManuallyVerifiedTrue: Public Key has been manually verified
nodeDetails.KeyManuallyVerifiedFalse: Public Key is not manually verified

pkiBackup.loseKeysWarning: If you lose your keys, you will need to reset your device.
pkiBackup.secureBackup: Its important to backup your public and private keys and store your backup securely!
pkiBackup.title: Резервні ключі

pkiBackupReminder.description: We recommend backing up your key data regularly. Would you like to back up now?
pkiBackupReminder.title: Backup Reminder

pkiRegenerate.description: Are you sure you want to regenerate key pair?
pkiRegenerate.title: Regenerate Key Pair

qr.description: The current LoRa configuration will also be shared.
qr.title: Згенерувати QR-код

reboot.title: Reboot device
reboot.description: Reboot now or schedule a reboot of the connected node. Optionally, you can choose to reboot into OTA (Over-the-Air) mode.

description.acceptNewKeys: This will remove the node from device and request new keys.
description.keyMismatchReasonSuffix: . This is due to the remote node's current public key does not match the previously stored key for this node.
description.unableToSendDmPrefix: Your node is unable to send a direct message to node:

removeNode.description: Are you sure you want to remove this Node?
removeNode.title: Remove Node?

shutdown.title: Розклад вимкнення
shutdown.description: Turn off the connected node after x minutes.

unsafeRoles.postamble: and understand the implications of changing the role.
unsafeRoles.title: Ви впевнені?

managedMode.title: Ви впевнені?
managedMode.description: Enabling Managed Mode blocks client applications (including the web client) from writing configurations to a radio. Once enabled, radio configurations can only be changed through Remote Admin messages. This setting is not required for remote node administration.

clientNotification.title: Client Notification
clientNotification.TraceRoute can only be sent once every 3: TraceRoute can only be sent once every 30 seconds
clientNotification.Compromised keys were detected and regen: Compromised keys were detected and regenerated.

resetNodeDb.title: Reset Node Database
resetNodeDb.description: This will clear all nodes from the connected device's node database and clear all message history in the client. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
resetNodeDb.failedTitle: There was an error resetting the Node DB. Please try again.

clearAllStores.title: Clear All Local Storage
clearAllStores.description: This will clear all locally stored data, including message history and node databases for all previously connected devices. This will require you to reconnect to your node once complete and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
clearAllStores.failedTitle: There was an error clearing local storage. Please try again.

factoryResetDevice.title: Factory Reset Device
factoryResetDevice.description: This will factory reset the connected device, erasing all configurations and data on the device as well as all nodes and messages saved in the client. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
factoryResetDevice.failedTitle: There was an error performing the factory reset. Please try again.

factoryResetConfig.title: Factory Reset Config
factoryResetConfig.description: This will factory reset the configuration on the connected device, erasing all configurations on the device. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
factoryResetConfig.failedTitle: There was an error performing the factory reset. Please try again.
